description: Relative class number h- of cyclotomic field Q(zeta_n) where n runs through positive integers not congruent to 2 (mod 4) [A042965, but omitting the initial 0].
comments: First edition of Washington incorrectly gives a(44) = h-(Q(zeta_59)) = 41421. [_Matthew Johnson_, Jul 20 2013]
references: L. C. Washington, Introduction to Cyclotomic Fields, Springer, pp. 353-360.
example: n=17: the 17th number not == 2 mod 4 is 23, and Q(zeta_23) = 3 is the first time that h- is bigger than 1, so a(17) = 3.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 16 2001
extensions: Missing term a(1) = 1 inserted by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 05 2009 at the suggestion of _Tanya Khovanova_ and _M. F. Hasler_
More terms (from b-file of A061653), _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 07 2012
